definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
to eliminate counterrevolutionaries/abbr. to 肅反|肃反[su4 fan3]
pinyin: su4 qing1 fan3 ge2 ming4 fen4 zi3

sentences.english: The elimination of counter-revolutionaries is a struggle of opposites as between ourselves and the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 肅清反革命分子的問題是敵我矛盾的鬥爭問題。

sentences.english: We must clear the area of enemy soldiers as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須儘快肅清這個地區的敵兵。

sentences.english: After new China was founded, the gangland forces in the mainland of China were eliminated completely.
sentences.chinese: 新中國成立後徹底肅清了中國大陸的黑社會勢力。

sentences.english: They fought bravely to clean up the bandits.
sentences.chinese: 他們英勇作戰以肅清土匪。

sentences.english: Attack UAE is to clear ONE domain and influence on Middle-East.
sentences.chinese: 而攻下阿聯酋就能夠肅清ONE對中東的影響。

sentences.english: The government established cheap politics government office 1974 then, wu begs clean up corruption.
sentences.chinese: 政府遂於一九七四年成立廉政公署，務求肅清貪污。

sentences.english: The infantry divisions mopped up remaining centres of resistance.
sentences.chinese: 陸軍各師肅清了殘餘的抵抗據點。

sentences.english: The mayor has promised to clean the crooks out of the city government.
sentences.chinese: 新上任的市長答應肅清市政府中的不良分子。

sentences.english: Outdated ideas should be rooted out.
sentences.chinese: 陳舊的思想觀念應當肅清。

sentences.english: At the same time can eliminate pre-menstrual swelling sense.
sentences.chinese: 同時可以肅清經期前的腫脹感。

sentences.english: The incident was an important step in eliminating the imperialistic privileges in China.
sentences.chinese: 這一事件是新中國肅清帝國主義在華特權的重要步驟。

sentences.english: After liberation , we rooted out a number of counter-revolutionaries.
sentences.chinese: 解放以後，我們肅清了一批反革命分子。

sentences.english: The new mayor promised to clean the crooks out of the city government.
sentences.chinese: 新上任的市長答應肅清市政府中的不良分子。

sentences.english: Even today, much effort is still needed to eliminate the pernicious influence of these absurdities spread by the Gang.
sentences.chinese: “四人幫”這些謬論的流毒，現在仍然需要大力肅清。

sentences.english: It is absolutely necessary to wipe out this tendency in each and every field of work.
sentences.chinese: 在每一個具體的工作中肅清這個傾向是完全必要的。

sentences.english: What does "Operation Sook Ching" refer to?

definition: strict/serious/solemn/dignified/to tidy up/to clean up/to purge/to adjust
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
strict law/cruel punishment/to carry out cruel law rigorously
to start a rebellion/to rise in revolt
to be in overall charge/to oversee
